remarks: Reversing multiplication in a ring reverses multiplication in the power series ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)
statement:
psropprmul.y $e |- Y = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
psropprmul.s $e |- S = ( oppR ` R ) $.
psropprmul.z $e |- Z = ( I mPwSer S ) $.
psropprmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` Y ) $.
psropprmul.u $e |- .xb = ( .r ` Z ) $.
psropprmul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
psropprmul $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) -> ( F .xb G ) = ( G .x. F ) ) $.
